tool_description: Tracks and analyzes app store optimization metrics including ranking positions, keyword performance, download trends, and conversion rates.

app_id.description: Unique app identifier or store URL

platform.description: Platform to track: ios or android

tracking_period.description: Number of days to track performance

regions.description: Region codes to track performance in

error_messages: Invalid app ID: App identifier not found on the specified platform.
Invalid platform: Platform must be 'ios' or 'android'.
Tracking period invalid: Period must be between 1 and 365 days.
Region not supported: One or more region codes are not supported.
Keywords limit exceeded: Maximum 50 keywords allowed for tracking.
usage: Provide app_id, platform, and tracking_keywords. Optionally set tracking_period and regions for customized monitoring. Returns comprehensive performance analytics.

visibility_score.description: Overall app visibility score from 0 to 100

performance_summary.description: Summary of key performance metrics and trends

optimization_recommendations.description: Actionable recommendations for improving ASO performance
